While treating pheochromocytoma or Ciplar 10 Tablet may be given to block the action of high-adrenaline hormones or to lower the risk of developing dangerously high blood pressure during surgery for removing the tumor.

How It Works: Ciplar-LA 20 Tablet contains Propranolol or a beta blocker. It works by affecting the body’s response to nerve impulses or especially in the heart. It slows down your heart rate and makes it easier for the heart to pump blood around the body. This prevents arrhythmias. It also widens the blood vessels in the body for better blood flow or thereby preventing angina as well as migraine. The exact mechanism by which it prevents tremors is not known or but experts believe that Ciplar-LA 20 Tablet helps block the nerve impulses to the muscles responsible for tremors. Propranolol helps block the effects of the chemical messengers namely or adrenaline and noradrenaline or that are produced by the brain and are responsible for increasing your heart rate which makes you feel anxious. This way it helps with anxiety. While treating pheochromocytoma or Ciplar-LA 20 Tablet may be given to block the action of high-adrenaline hormones or to lower the risk of developing dangerously high blood pressure during surgery for removing the tumor.

Take this medicine in the dose and duration as advised by your doctor. Swallow it as a whole. Do not chew or crush or break it. Inderal 40 Tablet is to be taken empty stomach.

How It Works: Inderal 40 Tablet contains Propranolol or a beta blocker. It works by affecting the body’s response to nerve impulses or especially in the heart. It slows down your heart rate and makes it easier for the heart to pump blood around the body. This prevents arrhythmias. It also widens the blood vessels in the body for better blood flow or thereby preventing angina as well as migraine. The exact mechanism by which it prevents tremors is not known or but experts believe that Inderal 40 Tablet helps block the nerve impulses to the muscles responsible for tremors. Propranolol helps block the effects of the chemical messengers namely or adrenaline and noradrenaline or that are produced by the brain and are responsible for increasing your heart rate which makes you feel anxious. This way it helps with anxiety. While treating pheochromocytoma or Inderal 40 Tablet may be given to block the action of high-adrenaline hormones or to lower the risk of developing dangerously high blood pressure during surgery for removing the tumor.

KT 5 Derm Cream is a combination of five medicines: Clobetasol or Gentamicin or Clioquinol (Iodochlorhydroxyquin) or Ketoconazole or and Tolnaftate. Clobetasol is a steroid. It also prevents forming fungal colonies. This is how it causes death of fungi and relieves your infection.

How to Use: Take this medicine in the dose and duration as advised by your doctor. Swallow it as a whole. Do not chew or crush or break it. Normaxin RT Tablet is to be taken empty stomach.
How It Works: Normaxin RT Tablet is a combination of four medicines: Chlordiazepoxide or Clidinium or Dicyclomine and Rabeprazole or which treats irritable bowel syndrome. Chlordiazepoxide is a benzodiazepine. It works by increasing the action of a chemical messenger (GABA) which suppresses the abnormal and excessive activity of the nerve cells in the brain. Clidinium and Dicyclomine are antispasmodic medicines which relax the muscles in your stomach and gut (intestine). They stop sudden muscle contractions (spasms) which in turn relieves cramps or pain or bloating or and discomfort. Rabeprazole is a proton pump inhibitor (PPI). It reduces the amount of acid in the stomach which relieves acid-related indigestion and heartburn.

Uses: Prevention of Migraine or

How to Use: Take this medicine in the dose and duration as advised by your doctor. Swallow it as a whole. Do not chew or crush or break it. Naxdom 500 Tablet may be taken with or without food or but it is better to take it at a fixed time.
How It Works: Naxdom 500 Tablet is a combination of two medicines: Naproxen and Domperidone. Naproxen is a non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) which works by blocking the release of certain chemical messengers that cause pain due to migraine. Domperidone is a prokinetic which works on the region in the brain that controls vomiting associated with migraine. It also increases the movement of the stomach and intestines or allowing food to move more easily through the stomach.
